question: Agents-How to Add a New Consumer
text:
Agents-How to Add a New Consumer
          
        
Step 1: Log-in to your agent account and navigate to the Dashboard:
Step 2: Select Search Existing Consumers from the Quick Links tab on the left-hand side of the page. This step triggers identify verification questions and is required before adding a new consumer to ensure that duplicate accounts are not created.
Step 3: The first page of the pre-screener prompts the agent to verify that they have the consumers permission to work with them. First, check the attestation box to verify that you have consent to work with the consumer:
Step 4: Input the consumers First Name, Last Name, and Date of Birth:
Step 5: Select a Document Type from the dropdown and provide the associated number for the consumer. The purpose of this step is to validate that the agent has the consumers consent to work with them.
Document Type dropdown:
Step 6: Select if consent was provided by the consumer via phone or in person. Then select Continue:
Step 7: Search for the consumer using one of the two options below. The purpose of this check is to ensure an account with that identifying information is not already created.
Option 1: SSN/DOB Combination
Option 2: Search by First Name/Last Name/DOB combination:
Step 8: After selecting one of the two options above, select Search. If the consumer does not have an account already, you will receive a No match found message and be prompted to Start new application and create a new account for the consumer:
Step 9: You will be prompted to create a new account for the customer. Enter the consumers First Name, Last Name, DOB, Zip Code, and Phone Number. The Email field is optional; if consumers add an email address, they will receive an activation link to log-in to their account.
Step 10: The account will be created, and you will receive a prompt to enter the individuals account view. Select Individual View to proceed:
Step 11: You will land on the consumers dashboard and can begin taking action on behalf of the consumer, including submitting applications and enrollments. To return to your agent account, select My Account.
